goal.en: Enhanced master graduate students reading publications and oral presentation abilities.
goal.ch: “訓練碩士班研究生閱讀相關論文與口頭報告 強化語文表達的能力“

content.ch: 碩士班研究生專題演講與討論

textbook.en: “Recent Journal (1 ~ 2 years) papers Or your research defense if your are in your second year of Master program.“
textbook.ch: “Recent Journal (1 ~ 2 years) papers Or your research defense if your are in your second year of Master program.“

grading.en: “Need to attaend each class and participate. (10％) Presentation (90％)“
grading.ch: “Need to attaend each class and participate. (10％) Presentation (90％)“

en.competency: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

ch.competency: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en: Department:MSc in Chemistry only.Year:Second Year only.Student ID:even numbers Only.
ch: 系所:限化學學系碩士班。年級:限二年級。學號:限雙號。
